text:
Oles Buzina (; 13 July 1969 – 16 April 2015) was a Ukrainian journalist, writer, and politician for the pro-Russia Russian Bloc party. He was a journalist for the Russian language tabloid newspaper "Segodnya".
Buzina was born in Kiev. In 1992, he graduated from Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv. He was married and had a daughter.
Buzina was shot and killed by masked men on 16 April 2015 in Kiev, aged 45.

annotations.surface_form: Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv
